rules.description: Home Row (w/out CapsLock)	⟶	  [C]FnSAG ([Ctrl] Fn Shift Alt GUI)
Home Row (w/out CapsLock)	⟶	  [Fn]CAGS ([Fn] Ctrl Alt GUI Shift)
Home Row (w/out CapsLock)	⟶	  [C]FnAGS ([Fn] Alt GUI Shift)
Caps to Fn	⟶	  Forward Delete Only
Home Row (with CapsLock)	⟶	  CFnSAG (Ctrl Fn Shift Alt GUI)
Home Row (with CapsLock)	⟶	  FnCAGS (Fn Ctrl Alt GUI Shift)
Home Row (with CapsLock)	⟶	  CFnAGS (Ctrl Fn Alt GUI Shift)
